languages.text: "Еретики неплохо снаряжены, но это их не спасет".
"The heretics are well armed, but it will not save them."
languages.original_text: "Еретики неплохо снаряжены, но это их не спасет".

traits.locale_text: "The heretics are well armed, but this is not going to save them."
"The heretics are well armed, but this is not going to save them."
"The heretics are well armed, but it will not save them."
"The heretics are well armed, but it will not save them."
"The heretics are well armed, but it will not save them."
"The heretics are well armed, but it will not save them."

languages.text: "Die Ketzer sind gut bewaffnet, aber das wird sie nicht retten."
languages.original_text: "The heretics are well armed, but it will not save them."

traits.locale_text: "Die Ketzer sind gut bewaffnet, aber das wird sie nicht retten."

languages.text: « Les hérétiques sont bien armés, mais ça ne les sauvera pas »
languages.original_text: "The heretics are well armed, but it will not save them."

traits.locale_text: « Les hérétiques sont bien armés, mais ça ne les sauvera pas »

languages.text: 「異端者たちは武装していますが、彼らを救うことはありません」
languages.original_text: "The heretics are well armed, but it will not save them."

traits.locale_text: 「異端者たちは武装していますが、彼らを救うことはありません」

languages.text: «Los herejes están bien armados, pero eso no les salvará».
languages.original_text: "The heretics are well armed, but it will not save them."

traits.locale_text: «Los herejes están bien armados, pero eso no les salvará».

languages.text: “尽管那些异端分子装备精良，但他们难逃一死。”
languages.original_text: "The heretics are well armed, but it will not save them."

traits.locale_text: “尽管那些异端分子装备精良，但他们难逃一死。”

languages.text: "Kâfirler iyi silahlanmış olsa da ölümlerinden kaçamayacaklar."
languages.original_text: "The heretics are well armed, but it will not save them."

traits.locale_text: "Kâfirler iyi silahlanmış olsa da ölümlerinden kaçamayacaklar."
